mapper.sql: id, title, department, routine, special, plan, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag
mapper.insert: insert into govmgt_log (title, department, routine, special, plan, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{special,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update govmgt_log set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, routine = #{routine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, special = #{special,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan = #{plan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update govmgt_log set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id}
